name: pff team grades with matchup opponent type param
expected_query: with "current_week_opponents" as (select "h" as "nfl_team", "v" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = 2025 and "week" = 4 and "seas_type" = 'REG' union select "v" as "nfl_team", "h" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = 2025 and "week" = 4 and "seas_type" = 'REG') select "player"."pid", t47ad5654ca693a9d5f883afb95577cd8.grades_offense as pff_team_grades_offense_0, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "current_week_opponents" on "player"."current_nfl_team" = "current_week_opponents"."nfl_team" left join "pff_team_seasonlogs" as "t47ad5654ca693a9d5f883afb95577cd8" on "t47ad5654ca693a9d5f883afb95577cd8"."nfl_team" = "current_week_opponents"."opponent" and "t47ad5654ca693a9d5f883afb95577cd8"."year" = 2024 where player.pos IN ('TEAM') group by t47ad5654ca693a9d5f883afb95577cd8.grades_offense, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
